Uses of Interface
com.avaya.csta.tonedetection.ToneDetectionListener

  • Packages that use ToneDetectionListener 
    Package Description
    ch.ecma.csta.monitor
    Contains classes for removing and adding listeners.
    com.avaya.csta.tonedetection
    Contains classes for detecting and reporting individual DTMF tones received on a device.

    • Uses of ToneDetectionListener in ch.ecma.csta.monitor

      Methods in ch.ecma.csta.monitor with parameters of type ToneDetectionListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void MonitoringServices.addToneDetectionListener(DeviceID device, ToneDetectionListener listener)
      Adds a listener to monitor the specified device for tone detection events.
      void MonitoringServices.removeToneDetectionListener(DeviceID device, ToneDetectionListener listener)
      Removes a previously specified tone detection listener.

    • Uses of ToneDetectionListener in com.avaya.csta.tonedetection

      Classes in com.avaya.csta.tonedetection that implement ToneDetectionListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ToneDetectionAdapter
      Implements a "do nothing" callback method for each tone detection event type.
      Methods in com.avaya.csta.tonedetection with parameters of type ToneDetectionListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ToneDetectionServices.addToneDetectionListener(DeviceID device, ToneDetectionListener listener)
      Deprecated. 
      Use MonitoringServices.addToneDetectionListener instead.
      void ToneDetectionServices.removeToneDetectionListener(DeviceID device, ToneDetectionListener listener)
      Deprecated. 
      Use MonitoringServices.removeToneDetectionListener instead.
